mapper.select:
select a.* from MA_SYNC a
and a.VERSION=#VERSION# and a.OMNAME=#OMNAME# and a.MODELNAME=#MODELNAME# and a.OMGUID=#OMGUID#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MA_SYNC(GUID, MODELNAME, DESCRIPTION, VERSION, OMGUID, SYNCIP, REMARKS, OMNAME, CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME ) VALUES(#GUID#, #MODELNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #VERSION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OMGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SYNCIP:VARCHAR:NULL#, #REMARKS:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OMNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# )
mapper.select:
select a.*, (select username from sa_user b where b.guid = a.updateuserguid) updateusername from MA_SYNC a
and a.guid=#GUID# aand .modelname=#MODELNAME# and a.description=#DESCRIPTION# and a.version=#VERSION#
and a.updatetime = (select max(updatetime) from MA_SYNC
where OMGUID = #OMGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#
)
and a.CREATETIME=#CREATETIME# and a.createuserguid=#CREATEUSERGUID# and a.UPDATETIME=#UPDATETIME# and a.updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID# and .omguid=#OMGUID# and a.syncip=#SYNCIP# and a.remarks=#REMARKS# and a.OMNAME=#OMNAME# order by version desc
